title: 15 Anniversary Gifts That Are As Fun To Give As They Are To Receive
text:
Finding the perfect anniversary gift for your loved one can be a more daunting endeavor than it seems on paper. First, there’s the pressure that comes with trying to surprise the other person. Then, there’s the issue of trying to find something your partner actually wants — all without them never knowing that you’re trying for a surprise. Then again, some people hate surprises. Other people know exactly what they want. Some people say they hate surprises, but in reality, they still secretly want to be surprised anyway (guilty). Needless to say... gift-giving can be stressful, especially for an occasion like an anniversary.

Luckily, though, there are a handful of fool-proof anniversary gifts that just about anyone would love — from candles to lotion to luggage. Whether it’s your first anniversary, your 50th, or somewhere in between, here are 17 anniversary gifts that are just as fun to give as they are to receive.
